DOC.brief_summary: We believe that there is an association between BMI and oocyte diameter in women undergoing IVF treatments. We plan to measure the oocyte diameter in 2 groups of women undergoing IVF. One group will have BMI 20-25 and the other group will have BMI above 30.
DOC.brief_title: The Association Between Overweight and Oocyte Diameter in Women Undergoing Vitro Fertilization
DOC.criteria: IVF treated patients BMI between 2025 or over 30 Everyone else
